verbs.description: [V: running] brings awareness to different causes at the hartford marathon the 25th anniversary of the hartford marathon kicked off at 8 saturday morning in the cold and rain the start of a marathon is n't when the starting horn goes off before the race adrenaline rushes keep athletes anxious to start we 're just so excited beth schluger sasha sanford old saybrook sma solar technology horn running germany kevin toomey partner valley regional high school anne oeldorf- hirsch marathon hartford connecticut hartford marathon jaclyn young greg anne oeldorf hirsch hartford donna dickerman old saybrook connecticut sma
